fields.name: Oak Broom
fields.description: An oak broom will give you a special pleasure due to the aroma alone! And the oak broom is also good for anyone suffering from headaches.

fields.name: Bath hat
fields.description: Bath and sauna caps are made of natural material – felt. Excellent quality and a huge selection of various sauna and bath hats – you will find all this with us.

fields.name: Sponge natural
fields.description: The bath sponge is massage-hygienic, made of specially selected delicate natural Cotton, which gives a unique feeling of gentle massage and pristine cleanliness.    It massages well and gently cleanses the skin.

fields.name: Body massager
fields.description: A foot massager, a wooden one, is a wonderful tool for maintaining your beauty. It will make life a little better, and appearance – well-groomed.

fields.name: Bucket 1.5L
fields.description: Linden is a material that has long been in great demand among bathhouse attendants.

fields.name: Essential oil
fields.description:
Set of 3pc*10mg of Orange, Cinnamon, Melissa.
Ingredients: Essential oils of orange, cinnamon, melissa.
Ancient healers knew that a bath or a bath using aromatic oils is the most effective way to improve the body.

fields.name: 1-3 people
fields.description: A small cozy sauna, a great solution for a young family or couple.

fields.name: 3-4 people
fields.description: For an exciting holiday in the company of your closest ones.

fields.name: 4-8 people
fields.description: A spacious sauna with a swimming pool and a relaxation room.
